snippet: Hackers plastered the names of the so-called secret witnesses in the murder trial in the death of the former Prime Minister Rafik Hariri on a major Lebanese news Web site.
abstract: Hackers break into Web site of Lebanese newspaper Al Mustaqbal, posting names, photos and personal data of so-called secret witnesses for trial in killing of former Prime Min Rafik Hariri; direct visitors to site called Journalists for the Truth, which is traced to registry in Netherlands; tribunal denounces hacking operation, saying it endangers lives of Lebanese citizens and that list does not accurately reflect official court records.
lead_paragraph: Hackers plastered the names of the so-called secret witnesses in the murder trial in the death of the former Prime Minister Rafik Hariri on a major Lebanese news Web site.

headline.seo: Hackers Reveal Witness Names in Hariri Murder Trial
headline.main: Hackers Post Witness List in Trial on Ex-Premier’s Death
headline.print_headline: Hackers List Witnesses In Lebanon Killing Trial
